item.title: Multiple Dead After Tour Bus Crashes in Western New York
item.description: At least one child was among those killed when a tour bus crashed about 30 miles east of Buffalo, officials said. Part of the New York State Thruway w...

item.title: Trump’s Revenge Campaign, Live on Morning TV
item.description: The recent F.B.I. raid on John Bolton’s home makes clear that President Trump is perverting the justice system to intimidate his critics.

item.title: Hegseth Authorizes National Guard Troops in D.C. to Carry Weapons
item.description: It remains unclear whether the National Guard soldiers will be armed as they walk through the city.

item.title: DeSantis Says He Is Undeterred by Order Shutting Down Florida’s ‘Alligator Alcatraz’
item.description: A federal judge had ordered that much of the Florida immigration detention center be dismantled, a ruling Gov. Ron DeSantis called “preordained.”

item.title: Move Over, Mouse Ears: For Disney Adults, There’s a New Obsession
item.description: Tiny stuffed animals that use magnets to stay perched on your shoulder have become a must-have accessory for some theme park superfans.
